show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Behind America’s Debt-Based Economy
content:
Greek economist Yanis Varoufakis, author of The Global Minotaur: America, the True Origins of the Financial Crisis and... <!--more--> the Future of the World Economy, turns prevailing economic theory about debt and the global economy on its head.
 There is no debt crisis — either in the United States or in individuals countries of the West currently experiencing sharp economic downturns — he says.
To the contrary, he says, the economic crisis is the result of “too much savings with no place to go.”
